public static int readStream(java.io.InputStream is,
                             byte[] data,
                             int len)
                      throws java.io.IOException
Read a stream in a byte array.

Parameters:
is - - The stream to read
data - - The byte array into which to read the data. If null the array will be allocated
len - - The number of bytes to read
Returns:
A count of the bytes read.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
